item.description:
@p00n_scape wrote:

Hello, i’m useing Delta And i need the Following for Range/Mage… i have added some but they dont seem to work… here are some tht i have but they dont Work -.- The Melee i dont have it Can anyone Help me?

[size=24pt]I WILL REP YOU…[/size]
Range: } if (usingRange && GoodDistance(absX, absY, PlayerHandler.players[followID].absX, PlayerHandler.players[followID].absY, 6)){ followID = 0; usingRange = false; return;
Range:if(UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing){ followID = AttackingOn2.playerId; if (!GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 17)){ sM("You are too far to range your enemy!"); ResetAttack(); return false; }
Mage: if (!GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 15)) return false; if (!playerMage(AttackingOn)) { splash = true; } else { splash = false; }
